main event: On July 23, 1957, a shiny white circular object, the size of a basketball, hovered in the sky for approximately 10 seconds as observed via ground-radar.
interesting points: The object was observed at a 45-degree angle while looking north,The sighting occurred at 3:21 A.M.,The object's movement was in a straight line from east to west,No other reports were confirmed from the given time frame,The observation was classified as ground-visual and lasted less than a minute.
location: New York City, New York, USA
